short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sort and manage your browser tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tabs Sorter is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help you efficiently manage and organize your open browser tabs. With this tool, you can easily sort tabs based on their domains and set custom sorting rules to prioritize specific domains, ensuring that your most important tabs are always at the top.

Features:
1. Sort Tabs by Domain: Automatically organize all open tabs in the current window based on their domains.
2. Custom Sorting Rules: Select which domains you want to prioritize, and the extension will sort your tabs accordingly.
3. Persistent Preferences: Your sorting preferences are saved, so you don't need to set them every time you use the extension.
4. Easy Tab Management: Quickly view and close tabs directly from the extension interface.
